name: Hamburger Jazz
author: MARIAHPIE
summary: My grandma used to make this and it was always a hit. She uses American cheese, but I make it with mozzarella. Very easy and yummy!
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  cream of mushroom soup
1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes with juice
½ cup long grain white rice
directions: Crumble the ground beef into a skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir until evenly browned
Drain off grease, and stir in the cream of mushroom soup, tomatoes, and uncooked rice
Cover, and simmer over low heat, stirring occasionally, until rice is cooked, about 15 minutes
When the rice is done cooking, transfer the contents of the skillet to a casserole dish
Cover with a layer of cheese
Broil until the cheese is melted and toasty
